name: Sense Link
text: When you and your eidolon share senses, your combined minds grant you exceptional powers of observation.
benefit: When sharing the senses of your eidolon, you gain a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks for the duration of your bond senses ability.
text_zh: 当你和幻灵共享感官时，这种联系给予你超人的观察力。
benefit_zh: 当你幻灵共享感官时，你在【连觉】能力持续时间中于察觉检定上获得+4表现加值。
